'''''Gandalf's Battle on the Bridge in the Mines of Moria''''' is a New Age spiritual book (teaching the doctrines of [[Wikipedia:Ramtha's School of Enlightenment|Ramtha's School of Enlightenment]]) which lends its title from [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s [[Middle-earth]].
